sentence.Network_en: Emaciated, wild eyed rats darted about fitfully in a small cage.

sentence.Network_en: And why permit her wild - eyed brother to shoot and kill me, when I could shoot straighter?
sentence.Network_cn: 又为什么要让她那个凶暴的兄弟在我能够打得更准的情况下来开枪打死我 呢 ?
